articles.title: Talks between DPRK Vice FM and General Secretary of DR Congo FM Held
articles.content:
Talks between DPRK Vice FM and General Secretary of DR Congo FM Held
Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- Talks between  DPRK Vice Foreign Minister Sin Hong Chol, who visited DR Congo as head of a delegation of the DPRK Foreign Ministry, and the general secretary of the DR Congo Ministry of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation took place on August 8.
					 Sin Hong Chol said the servicepersons and people of the DPRK are registering successes in the drive for glorifying this year as a year of victors under the uplifted banner of self-reliance and self-development, true to the line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					 He referred to the principled stand of the DPRK on the present situation on the Korean Peninsula and the world and the issue of developing the bilateral ties.
					
					 The general secretary recalled that President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il rendered sincere help to DR Congo in the past, saying that President Joseph Kabila Kabange and the government of DR Congo are attaching special importance to the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.
					
					 It is the firm stand of the DR Congo government to support the Korean people in their just cause of achieving the national reunification and defending the sovereignty and dignity of the country by their own efforts, he stressed.
					
					 Expressing great satisfaction over the development of the friendly relations between the two countries, he noted that DR Congo would expand bilateral economic cooperation and actively introduce the advanced technology and experience of the DPRK.
					
					 During his visit Sin separately met and had talks with the minister of Communication and Media and a vice-minister of Interior and Security of DR Congo.

articles.title: WPK Delegation Leaves for African Countries
articles.content:
WPK Delegation Leaves for African Countries
Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) led by Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the WPK, left here on Thursday to take part in the 7th Congress of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola and visit African countries.

articles.title: CPRC Spokesman Censures Park Geun Hye Group's Smear Campaign against DPRK
articles.content:
CPRC Spokesman Censures Park Geun Hye Group's Smear Campaign against DPRK
Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country (CPRC) of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea gave an answer to the question raised by KCNA on Thursday as regards the south Korean puppet regime's accusations against the DPRK to dodge the mounting criticism of the THAAD deployment in south Korea.
					 The south Korean puppet group are driven into a tight corner by the strong criticism and protest against the THAAD deployment from not only south Korean public but also from all Koreans and the international community, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					 They deserve it for their inveterate sycophancy towards the U.S. and pro-U.S. policy, utterly indifferent to the national dignity and interests.
					
					 It is well known that Park Geun Hye flew into the U.S. and took an oath to be loyal to Obama right after she came to power as she knew well the reason why her father, "yusin" dictator, was shot to death by a confidant of the U.S. 
					
					 Such traitor is describing the THAAD deployment as "an independent resolution" to cope with the "threat" from the DPRK. This is sophism that provokes a side-splitting laughter.
					
					 No matter how hard the Park group try to pass the buck to the DPRK to get rid of the pretty fix due to the THAAD deployment, nobody will be taken in by their petty trick and they cannot conceal their treacherous act of gravely threatening the peace on the Korean peninsula and in the region in pursuance of the U.S. scenario.
					
					 Great irony is that the south Korean puppet group are behaving disgustingly, claiming that they can roll back the plan for THAAD deployment as they please if the north dismantles its nukes and missiles.
					
					 They dare compare the self-defensive nuclear force, pride of Juche Korea, with scrap-iron-like THAAD as if having a bargaining. This is nothing but an absurd jargon of the fools failing to know who their rival is.
					
					 The south Korean regime should know well that the DPRK's nukes can never be an object of bargaining with the U.S. and others. It had better bear in mind that its peddling "threat from the north's nukes" here and there would get it nowhere.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that the whole of south Korea is bound to turn into a theatre of a nuclear war to be launched by the U.S. and the south Korean people will be put at greater peril as long as top-class pro-U.S. lackey Park Geun Hye stays in power.
					
					 All Koreans are called upon to resolutely bury Park Geun Hye group, disgrace to the nation and troublemaker of the international community, to defuse the ever-increasing danger of U.S. nuclear war against the DPRK and preserve peace on the peninsula and in the region.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Chad
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Chad
Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greeting to Idriss Deby Itno, president of the Republic of Chad, on Thursday on the 56th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message wished the president, government and people of Chad successes in their work for the country's development and national unity, expressing belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in common interests.

articles.title: Swiss Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Swiss Delegation Leaves
Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Communist Party of Switzerland led by General Secretary Massimiliano Ay left here for home on Thursday.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Visits Different Places
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Visits Different Places
Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Japan Nagano Prefectural People's Council for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea led by Chairman Tomohiko Murayama visited the Tower of the Juche Idea.
					 The guests went round different places of the grand monument showing the ideological and theoretical exploits of President Kim Il Sung and commanded a bird's-eye view of Pyongyang City from the belvedere of the tower.
					
					 The delegation toured the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, the Sci-Tech Complex, the Munsu Water Park, etc.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- A home visiting group of Koreans in Japan visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Thursday.
					 They laid a bouquet before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Party and State Commendations to Those of Merits in Construction of Wonsan Army-People Power Station
articles.content:
Party and State Commendations to Those of Merits in Construction of Wonsan Army-People Power Station
Wonsan, August 11 (KCNA) -- Party and state commendations were awarded to the builders, scientists, technicians, officials and helpers who performed labor feats in the construction of the Wonsan Army-People Power Station with due ceremony on Thursday.
					 Ri Sang Chol, Rim Sok Sun, Han Su Nam and five others received the title of Labor Hero of the DPRK and Gold Medal (Hammer and Sickle) and Order of National Flag First Class.
					
					 Ri Song Jin and Jon Kyong Chol were honored to receive the watches bearing the august name of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Citations of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, were conferred upon Jong Ji Chol, Kim Pyong Ryul, Hwang Kum San and others.
					
					 Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize went to Om Kum Chol and Jong Chol Rim and Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize to So Myong Hun and Han Kwang Myong.
					
					 Titles of honor went to five persons and orders and medals to many builders, scientists, technicians, officials and helpers.

articles.title: Members of AINDF Pyongyang Mission Tour Arch of Triumph
articles.content:
Members of AINDF Pyongyang Mission Tour Arch of Triumph
Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- Chief Jo Il Min and members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) toured the Arch of Triumph on Thursday with the approach of the 71st anniversary of liberation of Korea.
					 They went round the monumental edifice recollecting the exploits President Kim Il Sung performed by leading the great anti-Japanese war to victory to liberate the country and save the destiny of the nation.

articles.title: International Seminar on Volcano on Mt. Paektu Held
articles.content:
International Seminar on Volcano on Mt. Paektu Held
Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- An international seminar on Mt. Paektu volcano had been well conducted in the Sci-Tech Complex from Aug. 9 to 11 under the co-sponsorship of the Pyongyang International Information Centre for New Technology and Economy and Mt. Paektu Geoscientific Group.
					 Participated in the seminar were volcano and geophysics experts from the DPRK and several other countries including UK, the U.S., Canada, Germany and China.
					
					 The seminar presented the achievements in the study of volcanism, geological and environmental history in the area of Mt. Paektu with the academic exchange of views on the issues of common concern.
					
					 Mmeanwhile, Alastair William James Morgan, British ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception on Wednesday on the successful holding of the seminar.

articles.title: Sci-Tech Achievements Made by Kim Il Sung University
articles.content:
Sci-Tech Achievements Made by Kim Il Sung University
Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- Teachers and researchers of Kim Il Sung University in the DPRK have made successes in the research into basic sciences and hi-tech development.
					 They made an achievement of great significance in the research into nonlinear nanooptics, thus laying theoretical and methodological foundation for developing ultra-modern technologies like IT, nanotechnology and biological technology.
					
					 A signal achievement was made in developing core elements for the next-generation ultra-fast optical device.
					
					 The university developed a molecular marker for examining the species of fishes and checking fish products, while making progress in the research into fish diseases and their prevention.
					
					 It also produced cermet cutting tools to be conducive to the development of the nation's machine-building industry.

articles.title: Orphans' Primary and Secondary Schools under Construction in DPRK
articles.content:
Orphans' Primary and Secondary Schools under Construction in DPRK
Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- The construction and renovation of orphans' primary and secondary schools are getting momentum in different parts of the DPRK, thanks to the love of the Workers' Party of Korea for younger generation and future.
					 The construction of an orphans' primary school is progressing apace in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province. Builders finished the frame-working of over 10 buildings, including school building, hostel, refectory and gymnasium, by introducing rational methods of construction. Now, outdoor and indoor plastering is going on there in quick tempo.
					
					 In Ryanggang Province, a ground concrete tamping is being carried out at the final stage as part of the project to reconstruct the Hyesan Orphans' Secondary School. Its builders have overfulfilled their daily assignment at over 150 percent while provincial institutions and industrial establishments giving sincere assistance to the project.
					
					 Similar successes can be heard from the construction sites of orphans' primary and secondary schools in North and South Phyongan, Jagang and North Hamgyong provinces and Nampho City.

articles.title: National Sci-tech Presentation in Field of Chemical Industry Held
articles.content:
National Sci-tech Presentation in Field of Chemical Industry Held
Anju, August 11 (KCNA) -- A national sci-tech presentation in the field of chemical industry was held at the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex on Aug. 10 and 11.
					 The presentation was sponsored by the C.C., the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea. 
					
					 Present there were scientists, technicians, teachers, graduate students and officials in the fields of science, education and chemical industry including the State Academy of Sciences, Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Pyongyang Han Tok Su University of Light Industry, Hamhung University of Chemical Engineering and the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex.
					
					 The presentation was divided into panels of fertilizer, plastics and fiber, rare-earth and paper. Its participants heard more than 120 papers helpful to maintaining and overhauling in good time production facilities and systems, expanding production capacities and realizing the local production of catalyzer in the field of chemical industry in order to put Juche fertilizer, Juche vinalon and basic chemical goods production on normal footing.
					
					 Drawing the attention of the participants were successes which have been introduced into factories and enterprises in the field of chemical industry including the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex to locally produce raw materials and ensure economic efficiency.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Condemns Park Geun Hye Regime's Obstructions to Joint Conference for Reunification
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Condemns Park Geun Hye Regime's Obstructions to Joint Conference for Reunification
Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- All Koreans and the international community are closely following the developments on the Korean peninsula since the DPRK proposed a great national conference for reunification to mark the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 How to approach the proposal for convening a joint conference of all political parties, organizations and individual personages in the north, the south and abroad represents the stand on the crucial proposal to repair the north-south relations facing the worst crisis by the concerted efforts of the nation and make a breakthrough in the drive for achieving national reunification. It also serves as a touchstone to distinguish the pro-reunification forces from the anti-reunification forces.
					
					 That's why all Koreans at home and abroad and the international community expressed positive support and response to the proposal and have made efforts to make it successful.
					
					 It is only the ruling forces of south Korea that are swimming against this trend.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime has flatly turned down the proposal, describing it as a "strategy for the united front" and "bogus peace offensive." It has got desperate in blocking the activities of people of various circles in south Korea including the South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification.
					
					 Due to the vicious obstructions of the puppet regime, the preparatory work for the joint conference has faced serious difficulties and the formation of the pan-national joint preparatory committee has been delayed.
					
					 This clearly proves that the puppet regime is working hard to chill the desire of the fellow countrymen to the last by pursuing the wild ambition for "unification of social systems" and "unification through absorption."
					
					 As known to everybody, the proposal of the DPRK was prompted by its single patriotic desire to defuse the decades-long north-south confrontation and antagonism, distrust and hostility and to write a new history of independent reunification by joining hands with each other and through bold practice. There is no reason for any member of the nation to refuse to respond to it.
					
					 It is unjustifiable anti-national and anti-reunification act for the puppet regime to turn down the just proposal of the DPRK and obstruct the preparations of political parties, organizations and individual personages in south Korea for opening the joint conference
					
					 Not content with making the June 15 national joint event abortive, the Park regime is getting desperate in its moves to disturb the preparations for the joint conference. The regime is, indeed, a group of traitors who are utterly indifferent to the interests of the nation.
					
					 The Park group, seized with sycophancy towards the U.S. and the wild ambition for achieving "unification through absorption," is ceaselessly introducing nuclear war hardware including THAAD into south Korea, rendering the situation extremely tense, and desperately resorting to risky moves to do harm to the lives and security of all Koreans, playing the role of a shock brigade of the U.S. in carrying out its strategy for dominating Asia-Pacific.
					
					 If the group persistently toes the U.S. policy and escalates the confrontation with the compatriots in the north in disregard of the strong desire of all Koreans for reunification, it will never be able to escape isolation, ruin and stern punishment by history.
					
					 No force on earth can ever check the dynamic advance of all Koreans to achieve independent reunification by rejecting outside forces and pooling their efforts.
					
					 The great national conference for reunification is sure to open.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Group Inciting Confrontation with North
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Group Inciting Confrontation with North
Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a commentary condemns the south Korean puppet group for inciting the confrontation with the north while talking about the "north's possibility of committing terrorist acts."
					 It goes on:
					
					 The DPRK will never pardon those, suffering from mental derangement, attempting to disgrace its dignified image with fabrication and plots.
					
					 The puppet forces malignantly take issue with the compatriots in the north while trumpeting about "terrorism and abduction" which have nothing to do with the DPRK. Lurking behind this is a sinister intention that can never be overlooked.
					
					 This is aimed to incite the hostility toward the compatriots by taking advantage of the ever mounting anti-Park Geun Hye sentiment in south Korea and terror-phobia spreading among inhabitants.
					
					 In fact, as for terrorism and abduction, the DPRK has to blame the Park group.
					
					 The die-hard terrorist villains pretend to be ignorant about hideous crimes they committed and make desperate efforts to charge the DPRK with "terrorism". This is a shameful act reminding one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 The vicious moves of the Park group covering up the criminal nature of its allurement and abduction of inhabitants of the DPRK in a bid to tide over the serious ruling crisis are inviting unanimous curse and denunciation at home and abroad.

articles.title: South Korean Military Warmongers Hell-bent on Arms Build-up
articles.content:
South Korean Military Warmongers Hell-bent on Arms Build-up
Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean warmongers are busy with preparations for setting up the Kill Chain, weapon system for pre-emptive attack on the north, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 They set about developing 5 spy satellites, the core of the Kill Chain, for the purpose of deploying them for action by 2022.
					
					 The Defence Agency announced that on Aug. 10 it would open a briefing on the preparations for choosing the enterprise to be involved in the satellite development.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group also plans to purchase air-to-surface missiles, a component of the Kill Chain, from Europe and deploy them for action within two or three months to come.
					
					 The warmongers openly claimed that they were to make a precision strike at Pyongyang and all other parts of the DPRK and its major core facilities from long distance.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Denounced for Bringing Charges against North-South Exchange Activities
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Denounced for Bringing Charges against North-South Exchange Activities
Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Ministry of Unification fined 11 members of the south Korean Council of Christian Churches for the violation of the "law on the south-north exchange and cooperation" in July, according to the south Korean CBS on August 9.
					 The Committee of Reconciliation and Reunification of the Council of Christian Churches had a talk with a religious organization of the north abroad in June.
					
					 The ministry branded the above-said fact as an illegal contact and inflicted an unreasonable punishment upon them.
					
					 Saying that this is an act to check even the peace movement of the world church, the committee urged the south Korean authorities to immediately stop the sanctions on the non-governmental exchange and opt for the south-north dialogue.

articles.title: New Statue of Girl for Peace Erected in S. Korea
articles.content:
New Statue of Girl for Peace Erected in S. Korea
Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- A statue of a girl for peace was erected in Kunpho City, Kyonggi Province, south Korea on Aug. 9, bearing  witness to the sexual slavery, heinous unethical crime committed by the Imperial Japanese Army, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 The statue is the 30th one since the first statue of a girl for peace was erected before the Japanese Embassy in Seoul in Dec. 2011.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Liberates Korean Nation: DR Congo Paper
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Liberates Korean Nation: DR Congo Paper
Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung liberated the Korean nation.
					 The DR Congo paper L'Avenir on August 5 said this in an article titled "President Kim Il Sung, benefactor of liberation" dedicated to the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The international community is remembering with deep emotion President Kim Il Sung, who defeated U.S. and Japanese imperialism in one generation, with the approach of August 15.
					
					 The President defeated the Japanese imperialists who occupied Korea by force of arms, and liberated the country.
					
					 The Korean people held him in high esteem as the sun of nation and savior of liberated Korea as he led the 15-year long anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory.
					
					 This helped them make genuine contribution to the building of an independent and sovereign state as masters of their own destiny free from colonial slavery.
					
					 The feats of Kim Il Sung, benefactor of liberation, would be cherished in the hearts of the Korean people and other progressives century after century.
					
					 The paper dedicated one whole page to a special write-up, illustrated with a photo of Kim Il Sung making a historic address on his triumphant return to the homeland.

articles.title: DR Congo Body Lauds Kim Il Sung's Feats for Korea's Liberation
articles.content:
DR Congo Body Lauds Kim Il Sung's Feats for Korea's Liberation
Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo issued a bulletin on August 3 on the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The article titled "Peerless patriot, benefactor of national liberation" said that the immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung, benefactor of national rebirth, are shedding brilliant rays even though lots of water flew under the bridge and a century is replaced by the new one, adding that he dedicated himself to the country and people.
					
					 He, who embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years, formed the Down-with-Imperialism Union with the revolutionaries of the new generation, advanced the line of armed struggle based on the Juche idea, founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army and staged life-and-death struggle against the Japanese imperialists armed to the teeth even though it had neither state-backing home front nor assistance by a regular army and thus achieved the historic cause of Korea's liberation, it noted.
					
					 Stressing that Korea's liberation paved the way to independent development of the Korean people as the masters of their own destiny, for the first time in the national history spanning five-thousand years, it introduced all the democratic reforms enforced after the liberation.
					
					 Thanks to Kim Il Sung Korea was liberated and the DPRK is demonstrating its might as a politico-ideological and military power, youth power, satellite manufacturer and launcher and nuclear weapons state, it added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Report at WPK Seventh Congress Carried by French Bulletin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Report at WPK Seventh Congress Carried by French Bulletin
Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- The France-Korea Friendship Association carried the detailed gist of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's Report to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the Work of the Central Committee in its bulletin No. 127.
					 It also carried a photo of Kim Jong Un making the report.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group's Reckless Remarks against DPRK Denounced by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group's Reckless Remarks against DPRK Denounced by Swiss Organizations
Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on August 4 denouncing the Park Geun Hye group of traitors for making reckless remarks in a bid to divert to the DPRK the criticism of its THAAD deployment by people of all social strata of south Korea and the world.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Park Geun Hye of south Korea blustered at a "state council meeting" on August 2 that "she was anxious about continued conflict over THAAD deployment at a time when the north's nuclear and missile threats are becoming a reality" and "political camp should pool efforts to prevent inner split and conflict wanted by the north."
					
					 Intolerable is that Park Geun Hye, traitor to the nation and pro-U.S. element, is justifying that the THAAD deployment in south Korea is related to the non-existent "north's threat."
					
					 As the DPRK has repeatedly declared, its latest strategic strike means are targeting the U.S. and its followers keen on stifling the DPRK, not the Korean nation and the peaceful world.
					
					 It is the U.S. nuclear war hardware including THAAD, not the DPRK's nuclear force, that threaten peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It is natural that the south Korean people wage actions against the THAAD deployment.

articles.title: Mauritanian Internet News Introduce DPRK
articles.content:
Mauritanian Internet News Introduce DPRK
Pyongyang, August 11 (KCNA) -- Mauritanian internet news introduced Korea on August 4.
					 They said that Korea is a country with time-honored history of five-thousand years, it has been called a three thousand-ri land of tapestry as it has beautiful mountains and limpid stream and four distinct seasons and Pyongyang, capital city of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, is the center of politics, economy and culture, detailing its time-honored history and natural and geographical features.
					
					 Posted there were photos of the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Arch of Triumph, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, the Chollima Statue, the Monument to the Three Charters for National Reunification and other monumental edifices of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita 56o aniversario de independencia de Chad
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita 56o aniversario de independencia de Chad
Pyongyang, 11 de agosto (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 11 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de Chad, Idriss Deby Itno, con motivo del 56o aniversario de la independencia de este pais. 
					El remitente expreso la conviccion de que las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas conforme a los intereses comunes y deseo exitos en las labores del destinatario, el gobierno y el pueblo de Chad para el desarrollo del pais y la unidad nacional.

articles.title: Delegacion del PTC parte para visitar paises africanos
articles.content:
Delegacion del PTC parte para visitar paises africanos
Pyongyang, 11 de agosto (ACNC) -- La delegacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, presidida por Ri Su Yong, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido, partio este jueves de esta capital para tomar parte en el VII Congreso del Movimiento Popular de Liberacion de Angola y realizar una visita a los paises africanos.

articles.title: Park Geun-hye no puede ocultar su identidad de lacaya proyanqui: apunta CRPP
articles.content:
Park Geun-hye no puede ocultar su identidad de lacaya proyanqui: apunta CRPP
Pyongyang, 11 de agosto (ACNC) -- En relacion con que los titeres surcoreanos siguen calumniando a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea a fin de desviar las criticas de la opinion publica interna y externa contra el emplazamiento de THAAD en el suelo surcoreano, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria dio el dia 11 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					Ahora, los titeres surcoreanos se encuentran en el dilema sin salida por la fuerte protesta y denuncia de toda la nacion, en particular, la poblacion surcoreana de diferentes sectores, y la sociedad internacional contra el emplazamiento del sistema antimisiles norteamericano THAAD en el suelo surcoreano. 
					
					Esto es el resultado inevitable del enviciado servilismo proyanqui y la politica de favoritismo a EE.UU. de la banda titere surcoreana que se dedica a los actos antinacionales sin tomar en consideracion la dignidad y los intereses nacionales. 
					
					Park Geun-hye conoce bien por que su padre, dictador de "Yusin", murio tragicamente a balazos disparados por un sirviente de EE.UU.
					
					Sin embargo, tan pronto como llegara al poder, tomo el juramento de ser fiel a la administracion Obama. 
					
					Causa carcajadas el hecho de que Park describe la ubicacion de THAAD como una "decision independiente" tomada frente a la "amenaza" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					Aunque ella y sus seguidores actuen con desesperacion para imputar a la RPDC la responsabilidad por el incidente de THAAD, no podran enganar a nadie ni encubrir su crimen vendepatria pronorteamericano de haber creado una grave amenaza a la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la region obedeciendo a ciegas a EE.UU. 
					
					Lo mas ridiculo del caso es que ellos hablan como si fueran independientes diciendo que "si el Norte renuncia las armas nucleares y misiles, pueden abandonar el despliegue de THAAD". 
					
					Es una tonteria su intento de regatear con la chatarra THAAD las fuerzas nucleares de autodefensa de la parte connacional, orgullo de la Corea del Juche. 
					
					Ellos deben tener presente que las armas nucleares de la RPDC no pueden ser objeto de regateo ni con su amo gringo y que es inutil su insistencia en la "renuncia nuclear del Norte". 
					
					Mientras la traidora proyanqui de peor calana Park Geun-hye se mantenga en el poder, el territorio surcoreano se convertira inevitablemente en la base de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. y la poblacion surcoreana caera en la situacion mas peligrosa. 
					
					Toda la nacion coreana debe sepultar a la camarilla de Park, verguenza de la nacion y rompecabezas de la sociedad internacional, para frenar las cada dia mas graves maniobras de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y preservar la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto de la region.

articles.title: Condecorados ameritados en la obra de Central Hidroelectrica Kunmin de Wonsan
articles.content:
Condecorados ameritados en la obra de Central Hidroelectrica Kunmin de Wonsan
Wonsan, 11 de agosto (ACNC) -- Fueron otorgadas las condecoraciones del Partido y el Estado a los constructores, cientificos, tecnicos, funcionarios y ayudantes que realizaron meritos laborales en la construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica Kunmin de Wonsan. 
					Ri Sang Chol, Rim Sok Sun, Han Su Nam y otras 5 personas recibieron el titulo del Heroe del Trabajo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea junto con la Medalla de Oro "El Martillo y la Hoz" y la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase. 
					
					Ri Song Jin y Jon Kyong Chol recibieron el reloj con el nombre del Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					
					El diploma de honor del Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Jong Un, fue otorgado a Jong Ji Chol, Kim Pyong Ryul y Hwang Kum San; el Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Il Sung a Om Kum Chol y Jong Chol Rim; el Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Jong Il a So Myong Hun y Han Kwang Myong.
					
					5 personas recibieron el titulo honorario y muchos constructores, cientificos, tecnicos, funcionarios y ayudantes recibieron las ordenes y medallas. 
					
					La ceremonia de condecoracion tuvo lugar el dia 11.

articles.title: Efectuado seminario internacional para el estudio de volcan del monte Paektu
articles.content:
Efectuado seminario internacional para el estudio de volcan del monte Paektu
Pyongyang, 11 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar del dia 9 al 11 en el capitalino Palacio de Ciencias y Tecnicas el seminario internacional para el estudio del volcan del monte Paektu bajo coauspicios del Centro Internacional de Intercambio de Informaciones de Nueva Tecnologia y Economia de Pyongyang y el Grupo Cientifico de la Zona del Monte Paektu.
					Participaron los especialistas en volcanologia y geofisica de Corea, Gran Bretana, Estados Unidos, Canada, Alemania, China y otros paises. 
					
					En la ocasion se presentaron los exitos de investigacion alcanzados en los estudios sobre el volcanismo y la historia geologica y ambiental de la zona del monte Paektu y otros dominios y hubo el intercambio academico y de opiniones sobre los problemas de interes mutuo. 
					
					El dia 10, el embajador britanico en la RPDC, Alastair William James Morgan, ofrecio un banquete para festejar la apertura exitosa del seminario.

articles.title: Belicistas surcoreanos inician desarrollo de satelite para el ataque preventivo
articles.content:
Belicistas surcoreanos inician desarrollo de satelite para el ataque preventivo
Pyongyang, 11 de agosto (ACNC) -- Segun Yonhap News, los belicistas titeres surcoreanos impulsan con mas afan los preparativos del establecimiento de "Kill Chain", sistema de ataque preventivo contra el Norte de Corea.
					Iniciaron el desarrollo de 5 satelites de reconocimiento, componente principal de "Kill Chain", que seran emplazados hasta el ano 2022.
					
					La Agencia de Asuntos de Defensa anuncio que tendra lugar el dia 10 un encuentro de explicacion para seleccionar las empresas que participaran en dicha labor.
					
					Por otra parte, los titeres surcoreanos planean introducir de Europa dentro de 2 o 3 meses los misiles aire-tierra, otro componente de "Kill Chain", y ponerlos en servicio.
					
					Al respecto, dicen abiertamente que esos artefactos son para el ataque preciso a larga distancia contra Pyongyang y todo el territorio norcoreano, inclusive las instalaciones medulares.
					
					Para colmo, EE.UU. instiga mas la introduccion de misiles del Sur de Corea al permitir la venta a este de los receptores de GPS de uso militar.
